programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lúcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy
programme.desc: In a secluded countryside home, ten-year-old twins grow suspicious when their mother returns from plastic surgery distant and unrecognizable. Isolated from the world, they embark on a quest to find out whether this woman is their mother.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: East Frisian: Moor
programme.desc: Frank Weller's perfect proposal plans are derailed as he and Inspector Ann Kathrin Klaasen delve into a gruesome case. The couple must solve a case involving a poorly concealed body in Uplengen Moor and a kidnapping of twins in the city center.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Running On Sand
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: A Wedding
programme.desc: Zahira, eighteen years old, a Belgian-Pakistani girl wants to keep the baby growing inside her. Amir, her brother and confidant, promises to help her. But the parents have other ideas for the young girl.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: Future Is A Lonely Place
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for his family’s death, Frank stages a crime and turns himself in to infiltrate a prison drug ring. Frank aims to get close to the man responsible for their death, and forms a dangerous bond with a guard along the way.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Hoarders S12 - EP 18
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives.

programme.title: Domino Masters - EP 9
programme.desc: Teams of domino enthusiasts go head-to-head in a competition to create mind-blowing masterpieces and take home the title and cash prize.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Food - EP 7
programme.desc: Modern Marvels goes straight for the taste buds in an all-compassing celebration and exploration of food. Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.title: The Great Canadian Baking Show Series 5 - EP 6
programme.desc: The best amateur bakers from across Canada compete in a series of themed culinary challenges that celebrate their diversity. Ten of the country's most passionate bakers go head-to-head in a series of tasks that celebrate their diverse backgrounds, families and communities. In each episode they'll face three nail-biting rounds, in a warm-spirited competition that celebrates personal achievement and the joy of baking.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall - Series 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Returning season. Features three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall as he ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts.

programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.desc: Nero, a mysterious bird following Asta, appears to Finral and urges him to take it to the Demon bones in Hage.

programme.desc: Asta is born with no magical power in a magic world. He aims to be the Wizard King to prove his own strength.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy
programme.desc: In a secluded countryside home, ten-year-old twins grow suspicious when their mother returns from plastic surgery distant and unrecognizable. Isolated from the world, they embark on a quest to find out whether this woman is their mother.

programme.title: East Frisian: Moor
programme.desc: Frank Weller's perfect proposal plans are derailed as he and Inspector Ann Kathrin Klaasen delve into a gruesome case. The couple must solve a case involving a poorly concealed body in Uplengen Moor and a kidnapping of twins in the city center.

programme.title: Running On Sand
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: A Wedding
programme.desc: Zahira, eighteen years old, a Belgian-Pakistani girl wants to keep the baby growing inside her. Amir, her brother and confidant, promises to help her. But the parents have other ideas for the young girl.

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: Two Danish-Korean adoptees, Karoline and Thomas, return to their birth country for the first time. The pair meet in Seoul where they encounter fellow adoptees, sparking an emotional journey that challenges their destiny and identity.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Murder in Mont St. Michel
programme.desc: A seemingly mystical murder takes Captain Sophie back to Mont-Saint-Michel, her childhood home and where her father is buried. She meets an exorcist priest and is annoyed by his silence but she's far from suspecting that a weighty secret unites them.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: Future Is A Lonely Place
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for his family’s death, Frank stages a crime and turns himself in to infiltrate a prison drug ring. Frank aims to get close to the man responsible for their death, and forms a dangerous bond with a guard along the way.

programme.title: Tuesday Club
programme.desc: Karin's world crumbles on her 40th anniversary when she discovers her husband’s infidelity. Seeking solace in a cooking class with renowned chef Henrik, she rediscovers her lifelong passions and learns that it is never too late to follow her dreams.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Our River...Our Sky
programme.desc: Baghdad. Sara, a single mother and novelist, shocked into silence by the surrounding violence, has been unable to write. She and her neighbours struggle to resist the fragmentation of their world and renew a fragile sense of hope for a better future.

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Cash On Delivery
programme.desc: This tale depicts the pain, prejudice, and guilt of a young man who is filled with fear and doubt about apples and the apple bearers because of a past incident in which he brutalizes his partner due to an apple-related event.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?
